name: What Will Hideo Kojima Do Next?
name_original: What Will Hideo Kojima Do Next?
description: Collaboration project for the Giant ROM 2 Game Jam by the Giant Bomb Community. Dourin provided character art assets. HypnoToadbrowrowrow created some cool music. Fattony12000 brought his great voice. Finally, Thurbleton (me) was lead design, writing, and code.
